page.title: 20Bideford:S+SE.Values.
page.content: Instead of personal a/cs from other par -ts of the area,views have been elicit- ed from a random sample of people,as fo llows:-Most useful recent discovery---- micro-chip &computer,micro-wave ovens, electric tin opener&carver,test-tube ba bies,permed hair.Cures most needed----- cancer,cystic fibrosis,multiple scleros is,mental handicap,love sickness.Proble ms most needing solution---unemployment starvation,inner city troubles,drug and solvent abuse,economic instability,reli gious and racial strife,nuclear threat cost of travel perhaps by electric cars &bikes or a cheaper version of petrol. Messages for future generations---Make peace and stop killing,keep smiling no matter what,stick to the 10 commandment s and look after the environment,be con siderate and not too intense,have fun. The Â£Domesday Team' hope their work has been found of interest.-S.M.Convent.Sch
